caption.p: Estimated age-specific mortality in the United States in 2020 for the scenario of 1 million additional COVID-19 deaths. Baseline mortality in 2020 is assumed to equal that in 2017. COVID-19 mortality is estimated by averaging the normalized death rates in Fig. 1 B and then multiplying these average rates to result in 1 million additional deaths using the US population age structure for 2020.
